resourceTemplates.name: delegated-latest-emails
resourceTemplates.title: Latest emails (delegated)
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieve the 15 most recent emails from the delegated user's Inbox, including subject, sender, received time, and read status.

resourceTemplates.name: delegated-search-email
resourceTemplates.title: Search delegated email
resourceTemplates.description: Search a delegated mailbox by keyword, name, or email address. Supports filters for importance, flagged messages, or attachments.

resourceTemplates.name: delegated-filter-email
resourceTemplates.title: Filter delegated email
resourceTemplates.description: Filter the delegated user's mailbox using advanced OData filters, e.g. hasAttachments eq true or importance eq 'high'.

resourceTemplates.name: delegated-emails-from-folder
resourceTemplates.title: Emails from delegated folder
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieve recent messages from a specific folder in a delegated mailbox (Inbox, SentItems, Archive, etc.), optionally filtered.

resourceTemplates.name: delegated-single-email
resourceTemplates.title: Single delegated email
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieve metadata and basic properties of a specific delegated email by ID.

resourceTemplates.name: delegated-single-email-details
resourceTemplates.title: Single delegated email details
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieve full details and body content of a specific delegated email, including recipients, attachments, and message body.

resourceTemplates.name: delegated-attachments-of-email
resourceTemplates.title: Attachments of delegated email
resourceTemplates.description: Get attachment metadata (id, name, size, contentType) for a given message in a delegated mailbox.

resourceTemplates.name: delegated-mail-folders
resourceTemplates.title: Delegated mail folders
resourceTemplates.description: List all mail folders available in a delegated user's mailbox (Inbox, Drafts, SentItems, Archive, etc.).

resourceTemplates.name: delegated-single-mail-folder
resourceTemplates.title: Single delegated mail folder
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieve properties and counts of a specific mail folder in a delegated mailbox.

resourceTemplates.name: delegated-contacts
resourceTemplates.title: Delegated contacts
resourceTemplates.description: List the first 10 contacts from the delegated user's mailbox, showing names, emails, and phone numbers.

resourceTemplates.name: delegated-search-contacts
resourceTemplates.title: Search delegated contacts
resourceTemplates.description: Search contacts in a delegated mailbox by name, company, or any other field, returning up to 10 matches.

resourceTemplates.name: delegated-child-folders
resourceTemplates.title: Delegated child folders
resourceTemplates.description: List subfolders of a specified folder in a delegated mailbox, including unread and total message counts.

resourceTemplates.name: delegated-reply-email
resourceTemplates.title: Reply to delegated email
resourceTemplates.description: Send a reply to a specific email within a delegated mailbox context.

resourceTemplates.name: delegated-folder-top-messages
resourceTemplates.title: Delegated folder top messages
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieve the most recent N messages from a given folder in a delegated mailbox, ordered by received date.
